long_description: The all-natural chuao Gourmet Chocolate bar is an irresistable treat on the trail; Ravishing Rocky Road flavor combines chewy marshmallows, salted caramelized almonds and milk chocolate. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The all-natural chuao Gourmet Chocolate bar is an irresistable treat on the trail; Ravishing Rocky Road flavor combines chewy marshmallows, salted caramelized almonds and milk chocolate.
